{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Toko |model=TMW1003 |revision= |fcc_date=02/04/2002 |manuf_country=Japan |is_manuf=Yes |availability=EoL |type=access point |fcc_id=NUSTMW1003,NUSTMW1003S1 |ic_id= |pwr_v=5.5 |pwr_amp=1.2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=No Wires Needed |cpu1_model=Poldhu |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=Atmel |fla1_model=AT49BV1614-90TI |ram1=8 |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT48LC4M16R2-75C |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |serial= |jtag= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=No Wires Needed |wi1_chip1_model=Poldhu |wi1_chip2_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip2_model=HFA3863 |wi1_chip3_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip3_model=HFA3683A |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn=unknown |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Agere |eth_chip2_model=LU3X31T2-T64 |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|2.4GHz Wireless LAN Access Point}}
"TOKO" and "TMW1003" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :This device uses the ''[[Intersil]]'' ISL3856 (''NWN'' Poldhu).
